name: Maelstrom
description: Fast-paced naval battles in a grim fantasy world of leviathans, warships and treasure! Featuring tactical, ship-vs-ship-vs-monster multiplayer, customization & progression!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64-bit or later Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 7 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
